1.summary: More comprehensive experiments needed on additional benchmarks and knowledge sources.
1.verbatim: - While the Thrust metric is evaluated on various tasks and datasets, it would be good to see even more comprehensive experiments, e.g. on additional benchmarks and knowledge sources.

2.summary: Further explanation of Thrust details like hyperparameters and runtime cost.
2.verbatim: - Some details on Thrust could be explained further, e.g. how hyperparameters like number of clusters are chosen, runtime cost of computing Thrust.

3.summary: Qualitative examples needed to illustrate when Thrust seeks external knowledge.
3.verbatim: - Qualitative examples illustrating when Thrust decides to seek external knowledge would provide additional insights.

4.summary: Lack of theoretical analysis justifying Thrust as an effective scoring function.
4.verbatim: - Theoretical analysis or justification of why Thrust is an effective scoring function would strengthen the work.
